UserCode.Behaviours
Class LinearEventVariable

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.Behaviours.Variable
      UserCode.Behaviours.LinearVariable
          UserCode.Behaviours.LinearEventVariable
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdatable, ILinearVariable, IVariable, IEventPublisher
public class LinearEventVariable
extends LinearVariable
implements IEventPublisher

LinearEventVariable inherits LinearVariable. This version publishes an event when the variable reaches either of its bounds.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Marc Price
